description: This Artic Svalbard Island is world-renown for it´s beautiful landscape and demanding weather conditions. In our own Norrøna svalbard collection, we blend heritage and future to make progressive hiking products. Their iconic Svalbard Cotton Jacket is a comfortable piece with all the functions and features to keep you protected from wind and some light showers out there in the wild. In this classic jacket, you´ll get a regular fit, hip length cut with articulated arms/elbows and a standard hood. This jacket works great with backpacks, and features two chest pockets and two hand pockets. This will easily be your favorite outdoor product.
name: Norrona Svalbard Cotton Jacket - Mens
